text: The Algeria national judo team represents Algeria at the international judo competitions such as Olympic Games or World Judo Championships. ==Medal count== Algeria has 9 participations in the Summer Olympic of 27 editions held from 1896 to 2016. {| class="wikitable" width=40% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" ! rowspan=2 | Competition ! colspan=5 | Medal table |- ! width=30 | !
